text: Hryhoriy Ishchenko (; 29 July 1946) is a former professional Soviet football defender and later Soviet and Ukrainian coach. Starting at the sports school in Kropyvnytskyi (at that time Kirovohrad),Vasylyshyn, V. Hryhoriy Ishchenko: "My football life transformed in favor of Khmenytskyi as well as the Ukrainian football in general" (Григорій Іщенко: "Моє футбольне життя складалось на користь як хмельницького, так і українського футболу загалом"). Podillya Khmelnytskyi fan-club. 31 October 2015 over his playing career Ishchenko played for Soviet lower leagues' clubs. After becoming a head coach, Ishchenko managed quite few professional clubs in Ukraine. Ishchenko's son Ihor Ishchenko is a former Ukrainian football referee. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kropyvnytskyi Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Shakhtar Oleksandriya players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:FC Avanhard Zhovti Vody players Category:FC Shakhtar Stakhanov players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:MFC Mykolaiv managers Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi managers Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi managers Category:FC Mukacheve managers Category:FC Advis Khmelnytskyi managers Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr managers Category:FC Oleksandriya managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Hryhoriy Ishchenko
